Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership in the 55/25 Plan for Tier 4 members in the New York city employees' retirement system to Hal Greenberg
Summary: Grants retroactive membership in the 55/25 plan for tier 4 members in the New York city employees' retirement system to Hal Greenberg for his time working in the New York city department of employment in 1995.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership in the 55/25 plan for tier 4 members in the New York city employees' retirement system to Hal Greenberg
